unnormalised: Interesting article! I've been considering Ayurveda for my back pain for ages. My aunt, Radha, swears by her treatments in Kerala, says it's changed her life! Remember Dr. Sharma's clinic on MG Road? Heard good things. Must try something before Diwali, maybe a Panchakarma at 14:00 hrs on 26/01/2024? Worth exploring, right? Especially after that crazy deadline at work on 10/09/2023.
